name: cBioPortal for Cancer Genomics
description: Aid discovery in complex cancer genomics data

projects.project_name: Re-implement Study View's data binning algorithm using SQL (instead of Java)
projects.summary: This project involves converting the data binning algorithm from Java to SQL to enhance efficiency and performance.
This project aims to develop a system for discovering similar patients based on medical data, enhancing patient care and research.

projects.project_name: AI/LLM Generated gene alteration and expression based subtyping for each tumor type
projects.summary: This project proposes the use of AI and large language models to automate the subtyping of tumors based on gene alterations and expressions.

projects.project_name: Create an automated metadata harmonization/curation tool
projects.summary: The goal of this project is to develop a tool that automates the harmonization and curation of metadata to ensure data consistency and quality.

projects.project_name: Clinical Timeline Standalone Package and Documentation
projects.summary: This project focuses on creating a standalone package for clinical timelines, along with comprehensive documentation to aid users.

projects.project_name: Create Chat Bot Interface Trained On Documentation Site
projects.summary: This project aims to develop an interactive chatbot that utilizes the documentation site to assist users in navigating and understanding features.
